text: Ben Herring (born 14 March 1980, Auckland, New Zealand) is a former rugby union player. He played for the Leicester Tigers in the Guinness Premiership. His position is flanker. Herring missed out on a 2007 Super 14 rugby contract with any New Zealand Super 14 team. He negotiated a move to join the Leicester Tigers in early 2007. In April 2009 Herring retired on medical advice after suffering a series of concussions. ==References== ==Other websites== *Leicester profile Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Auckland
title: Ben Herring
